      • resetIndex

        private void resetIndex​(HttpServletRequest request,
                        HttpServletResponse response)
                 throws ServletException,
                        IOException
        Sends user back to the Index page to allow user to select different state, starting date, and ending date
        Parameters:
        request - information sent to servlet
        response - information returned from servlet
        Throws:
        ServletException - when a servlet error occurs
        IOException - when the connection stream is interrupted

      • exitProgram

        private void exitProgram​(HttpServletRequest request,
                         HttpServletResponse response)
                  throws ServletException,
                         IOException,
                         SQLException
        Closes the database connection and exits the program. This method is called when the user clicks on the Exit button.
        Parameters:
        request - information sent to servlet
        response - information returned from servlet
        Throws:
        ServletException - when a servlet error occurs
        IOException - when the connection stream is interrupted
        SQLException - when a database error occurs

      • downloadData

        private void downloadData​(HttpServletRequest request,
                          HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws ServletException,
                          IOException,
                          SQLException
        Downloads the data from covidtracking.com and creates 3 tables (positive cases, hospitalizations, deaths) based on the data. Each table includes all states and all dates. This method is called when the user clicks on "Click to Launch" on the starting page (start.jsp)
        Parameters:
        request - information sent to servlet
        response - information returned from servlet
        Throws:
        ServletException - when a servlet error occurs
        IOException - when the connection stream is interrupted
        SQLException - when a database error occurs

      • createStates

        private void createStates​(HttpServletRequest request,
                          HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws ServletException,
                          IOException,
                          SQLException
        Creates a table for fifty states with abbreviations for each. This table is then used to populate the State dropdown list on the index page. This method is called when the user clicks on "Click to Launch"
        Parameters:
        request - information sent to servlet
        response - information returned from servlet
        Throws:
        ServletException - when a servlet error occurs
        IOException - when the connection stream is interrupted
        SQLException - when a database error occurs

      • createTable

        private void createTable​(HttpServletRequest request,
                         HttpServletResponse response)
                  throws Exception
        This method has been replaced by createTable2 in this version of the program.
        Parameters:
        request - information sent to servlet
        response - information returned from servlet
        Throws:
        Exception - when an error occurs

      • createTable2

        private void createTable2​(HttpServletRequest request,
                          HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws Exception
        Creates the Results table based on the user selection of state, start date, and end date. This method is called when the user clicks on "View State Data".
        Parameters:
        request - information sent to servlet
        response - information returned from servlet
        Throws:
        Exception - when an error occurs

      • deleteResult

        public void deleteResult​(HttpServletRequest request,
                         HttpServletResponse response)
                  throws Exception
        Deletes the Result record identified by the ID. This method is called when the user clicks on "Delete"
        Parameters:
        request - information sent to servlet
        response - information returned from servlet
        Throws:
        Exception - when an error occurs

      • updateResult

        private void updateResult​(HttpServletRequest request,
                          HttpServletResponse response)
                   throws Exception
        Updates the Result record identified by the ID. This method is called when the user clicks on "Save" on the Update form.
        Parameters:
        request - information sent to servlet
        response - information returned from servlet
        Throws:
        Exception - when an error occurs

      • loadResult

        private void loadResult​(HttpServletRequest request,
                        HttpServletResponse response)
                 throws Exception
        Loads the record to be updated into the Update Form. This method is called when the user clicks on "Edit"
        Parameters:
        request - information sent to servlet
        response - information returned from servlet
        Throws:
        Exception - when an error occurs

      • addResult

        private void addResult​(HttpServletRequest request,
                       HttpServletResponse response)
                throws Exception
        Adds a new Result object (record entry) to the Results table in the database. This method is called when the user clicks on Save on the "Add Entry" form.
        Parameters:
        request - information sent to servlet
        response - information returned from servlet
        Throws:
        Exception - when an error occurs

      • listResults

        private void listResults​(HttpServletRequest request,
                         HttpServletResponse response)
                  throws Exception
        Generates a list of results based on user selection of state, start date, and end date. This method is called (indirectly) after user clicks on View State Data, after the tables are created and also when user clicks on "Back to List".
        Parameters:
        request - information sent to servlet
        response - information returned from servlet
        Throws:
        Exception - when an error occurs
